meanings.definition: The quality of being unable to be imitated or copied.
meanings.sent1: Her inimitableness in painting made her stand out among all the artists.
meanings.sent2: The inimitableness of his signature style made him a legend in the art world.
meanings.sent3: Despite his attempts, he could never replicate the inimitableness of her cooking.
meanings.sent4: The inimitableness of her voice was like a rare gem in a sea of imitations.
meanings.sent5: The inimitableness of the sunset left everyone in awe of its beauty.

meanings.definition: The state of being unique and unmatched.
meanings.sent1: The inimitableness of her fashion sense always turned heads wherever she went.
meanings.sent2: His inimitableness in storytelling captivated audiences of all ages.
meanings.sent3: The inimitableness of the situation left everyone laughing at the unexpected turn of events.
meanings.sent4: Her inimitableness on the dance floor was like watching poetry in motion.
meanings.sent5: The inimitableness of the mountain peak took their breath away as they reached the summit.
